name: Topological Joint Rules
description: makes rules to apply joint types for each topology type.

inputParameters.name: L
inputParameters.description: Joint type to be applied to L topology. Default type is L-Miter. If L-Butt, the beam with a larger cross section area will be used as crossing beam.

inputParameters.name: T
inputParameters.description: Joint type to be applied to T topology. Default type is T-Butt.

inputParameters.name: X
inputParameters.description: Joint type to be applied to X topology. Default type is X-HalfLap.
